name: War Of The Roses: 2022
description:
A game made for the Yorkshire Jam competition over the space of a weekend. Set in an independent Yorkshire after the events of a no deal Brexit tears the UK apart, the War of the Roses resumes in 2022. In this game you play on the fringes of the conflict at border control on the Yorkshire - Lancashire border which is under attack from the 'Lancashire Defence Force'

-Credits-

  • Made in collaboration with Alex Bailey
  • Special thanks to William Mccarthy for providing the voice for our patriotic Yorkshire lad

-Controls-

  • WASD to move
  • Left click to shooot
  • Right click to throw grenades
  • Mouse wheel to switch weapons
